tests.name: validate without elements FAILS
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT WITH (kafka_topic='input', value_format='{FORMAT}');

expectedException.message: The statement does not define any columns.

tests.name: validate without elements OK - AVRO
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT WITH (kafka_topic='input', value_format='AvRo');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT WITH(PARTITIONS = 4) as SELECT * FROM input;

tests.name: validate with elements OK
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (V0 INT) WITH (kafka_topic='input', value_format='{FORMAT}');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT * FROM INPUT;

tests.name: validate with elements OK - AVRO
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (c1 INT) WITH (kafka_topic='input', value_format='AVRO');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT WITH(PARTITIONS = 4) as SELECT * FROM input;

tests.name: validate multiple value elements in C* FAILS - KAFKA
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (V0 INT, V1 STRING) WITH (kafka_topic='input', value_format='KafkA');

expectedException.message: The 'KAFKA' format only supports a single field. Got: V0 INT, V1 VARCHAR

tests.name: validate multiple value elements in C*AS FAILS - KAFKA
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (V0 INT, V1 STRING) WITH (kafka_topic='input', value_format='DELIMITED');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT WITH (value_format='kafka') AS SELECT * FROM INPUT;

expectedException.message: The 'KAFKA' format only supports a single field. Got: V0 INT, V1 VARCHAR

tests.name: validate boolean elements FAILS - KAFKA
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (V0 BOOLEAN) WITH (kafka_topic='input', value_format='KAFKA');

expectedException.message: The 'KAFKA' format does not support type 'BOOLEAN'

tests.name: validate boolean elements OK
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (V0 BOOLEAN) WITH (kafka_topic='input', value_format='{FORMAT}');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT * FROM INPUT;

tests.name: validate boolean elements OK
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (V0 BOOLEAN) WITH (kafka_topic='input', value_format='{FORMAT}');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT * FROM INPUT;

CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT * FROM INPUT;

statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (V0 STRING) WITH (kafka_topic='input', value_format='{FORMAT}');

tests.name: validate array element in C* FAILS
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (V0 ARRAY<INT>) WITH (kafka_topic='input', value_format='{FORMAT}');

tests.name: validate array element in C*AS FAILS
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (V0 ARRAY<INT>) WITH (kafka_topic='input', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT WITH (value_format='{FORMAT}') AS SELECT * FROM INPUT;

tests.name: validate array element OK
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (V0 ARRAY<INT>) WITH (kafka_topic='input', value_format='{FORMAT}');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT * FROM INPUT;

statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (V0 MAP<STRING, INT>) WITH (kafka_topic='input', value_format='{FORMAT}');

statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (V0 MAP<STRING, INT>) WITH (kafka_topic='input', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT WITH(value_format='{FORMAT}') AS SELECT * FROM INPUT;

tests.name: validate map element OK
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (V0 MAP<STRING, INT>) WITH (kafka_topic='input', value_format='{FORMAT}');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT * FROM INPUT;

tests.name: validate struct element in C* FAILS
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (V0 STRUCT<F0 STRING>) WITH (kafka_topic='input', value_format='{FORMAT}');

tests.name: validate struct element in C*AS FAILS
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (V0 STRUCT<F0 STRING>) WITH (kafka_topic='input', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT WITH(value_format='{FORMAT}') AS SELECT * FROM INPUT;

tests.name: validate struct element OK
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (V0 STRUCT<F0 STRING, F1 INT>) WITH (kafka_topic='input', value_format='{FORMAT}');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT * FROM INPUT;

tests.name: validate AVRO uses null for unknown element
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (c1 INT, unknown INT) WITH (kafka_topic='input', value_format='AVRO');
CREATE STREAM S WITH(PARTITIONS = 4) as SELECT * FROM input;

tests.name: validate AVRO fails on incompatible schema evolution
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (c1 INT) WITH (kafka_topic='input', value_format='AVRO');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT WITH(PARTITIONS = 4) as SELECT * FROM input;

expectedException.message: Cannot register avro schema for OUTPUT as the schema registry rejected it, (maybe schema evolution issues?)

tests.name: non-join with only ROWKEY and ROWTIME in projection
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (F0 INT) WITH (kafka_topic='input', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT ROWTIME, ROWKEY FROM INPUT;

tests.name: non-join removes ROWKEY and ROWTIME from output's value schema
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (F0 INT) WITH (kafka_topic='input', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT F0, ROWTIME, ROWKEY FROM INPUT;

tests.name: non-join leaves aliased ROWKEY and ROWTIME in output's value schema
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (F0 INT) WITH (kafka_topic='input', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT F0, ROWTIME AS TIME, ROWKEY AS KEY FROM INPUT;

tests.name: join removes ROWKEY and ROWTIME from output's value schema
statements: CREATE STREAM LEFT_STREAM (F0 INT) WITH (kafka_topic='left', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM RIGHT_STREAM (F1 INT) WITH (kafka_topic='right', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT as SELECT l.ROWTIME AS ROWTIME, l.ROWKEY AS ROWKEY, f0, f1 FROM left_stream l join right_stream r WITHIN 1 seconds ON l.rowkey = r.rowkey;

tests.name: join leaves aliased ROWKEY and ROWTIME in output's value schema
statements: CREATE STREAM LEFT_STREAM (F0 INT) WITH (kafka_topic='left', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM RIGHT_STREAM (F1 INT) WITH (kafka_topic='right', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT as SELECT l.ROWTIME AS TIME, l.ROWKEY AS KEY, f0, f1 FROM left_stream l join right_stream r WITHIN 1 seconds ON l.rowkey = r.rowkey;

tests.name: group-by removes ROWKEY from output's value schema
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (F0 INT) WITH (kafka_topic='input', value_format='JSON');
CREATE TABLE OUTPUT AS SELECT ROWKEY, COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM INPUT GROUP BY ROWKEY;

tests.name: group-by removes ROWTIME from output's value schema
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (F0 INT) WITH (kafka_topic='input', value_format='JSON');
CREATE TABLE OUTPUT AS SELECT ROWTIME, COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM INPUT GROUP BY ROWTIME;

tests.name: non-join qualified select star
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (F0 INT) WITH (kafka_topic='input', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT as SELECT i.* FROM INPUT i;

tests.name: non-join select star with unknown qualifier
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (F0 INT) WITH (kafka_topic='input', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT as SELECT unknown.* FROM INPUT i;

expectedException.message: 'UNKNOWN' is not a valid stream/table name or alias.

tests.name: join qualified select star left
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT_1 (F0 INT) WITH (kafka_topic='input_1', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM INPUT_2 (F0 INT) WITH (kafka_topic='input_2', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT as SELECT i1.* FROM INPUT_1 i1 JOIN INPUT_2 i2 WITHIN 10 SECONDS ON i1.ROWKEY = i2.ROWKEY;

tests.name: join qualified select star right
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT_1 (F0 INT) WITH (kafka_topic='input_1', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM INPUT_2 (F0 INT) WITH (kafka_topic='input_2', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT as SELECT i2.* FROM INPUT_1 i1 JOIN INPUT_2 i2 WITHIN 10 SECONDS ON i1.ROWKEY = i2.ROWKEY;

tests.name: join unqualified select star
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT_1 (F0 INT) WITH (kafka_topic='input_1', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM INPUT_2 (F0 INT) WITH (kafka_topic='input_2', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT as SELECT * FROM INPUT_1 i1 JOIN INPUT_2 i2 WITHIN 10 SECONDS ON i1.ROWKEY = i2.ROWKEY;

tests.name: join unknown qualified select star
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT_1 (F0 INT) WITH (kafka_topic='input_1', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM INPUT_2 (F0 INT) WITH (kafka_topic='input_2', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT as SELECT unknown.* FROM INPUT_1 i1 JOIN INPUT_2 i2 WITHIN 10 SECONDS ON i1.ROWKEY = i2.ROWKEY;

expectedException.message: 'UNKNOWN' is not a valid stream/table name or alias.

tests.name: non-join unknown field
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (F0 INT) WITH (kafka_topic='input', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT as SELECT unknown FROM INPUT;

tests.name: join unknown field
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT_1 (F0 INT) WITH (kafka_topic='input_1', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM INPUT_2 (F0 INT) WITH (kafka_topic='input_2', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT as SELECT unknown FROM INPUT_1 i1 JOIN INPUT_2 i2 WITHIN 10 SECONDS ON i1.ROWKEY = i2.ROWKEY;

tests.name: join ambiguous field
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT_1 (F0 INT) WITH (kafka_topic='input_1', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM INPUT_2 (F0 INT) WITH (kafka_topic='input_2', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT as SELECT F0 FROM INPUT_1 i1 JOIN INPUT_2 i2 WITHIN 10 SECONDS ON i1.ROWKEY = i2.ROWKEY;
